00034 #ifndef CSESS_H
00035 #define CSESS_H
00036 
00037 #include <string>
00038 #include <ctime>
00039 
00044 
00050 class csess {
00051         public:
00052                 virtual ~csess() {}
00054                 virtual std::string getid()=0;
00056                 virtual bool valid( const std::string & ) = 0;
00058                 virtual bool setval( const std::string &, const struct timeval & )=0;
00060                 virtual bool getval( const std::string &, struct timeval & )=0;
00062                 virtual bool setval( const std::string &, const std::string & ) = 0;
00064                 virtual bool setval( const std::string &, bool ) = 0;
00066                 virtual bool setval( const std::string &, const char *, unsigned ) = 0;
00068 
00069                 virtual bool getval( const std::string &, char *, unsigned ) = 0;
00070                 virtual bool getval( const std::string &, char **, unsigned & ) = 0;
00072 
00073                 virtual bool setval( const char *, const char * ) = 0;
00075                 virtual bool getval( const std::string &, bool & ) = 0;
00077                 virtual bool getval( const std::string &, std::string & ) = 0;
00079                 virtual bool rmval( const std::string & ) = 0;
00081                 virtual bool rm() = 0;
00083                 virtual bool open( const std::string & ) = 0;
00085                 virtual bool create( std::string & ) = 0;
00087                 virtual const char * errmsg() = 0;
00089                 virtual const char * dir() = 0;
00090 
00092                 static csess *alloc();
00093 };
